short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension to help focus on youtube content.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Focus Mode to help you focus on your grind.

Have you ever had this experience of getting distracted while researching/learning on Youtube?
Focus Mode is here to help you git rid of your recommendations which might not pertain to your researching/learning content. 

This extension works on the Youtube homepage and also on the video page.

*What the extension does?*
On the Homepage: 
It shows you only the search bar and hides all other tags. When you load Youtube with the extension toggle OFF, you will see your usual home feed with recommendations. But, when you turn the toggle ON, you will have only your search bar.

On the video page: When you load your videos with the toggle ON, you will have your video and comments but the recommendations will be not be visible.

This is ADHD friendly.

This extension comes with a toggle button. You can always enable your recommendations back when toggle OFF the extension.
